physical_appearance: This clipping is a page from the publication 'The Orient Illustrated Weekly'. The title is printed in a box in the center. The page features three articles and seven black-and-white photographs with captions. The edges of the page is slightly torn, especially at the bottom.
sgcool_label_text: "Prior to the World War II period, Indians in Singapore and Malaya retained strong political, sentimental and economic ties with their home country. Anti-colonial thoughts and actions, inspired by the ""call for freedom"" in India
